description: Inactive status will be applied to an account upon voluntary deactivation.

deactivation_process.initiation: A user can initiate the deactivation process by contacting us via email or our call center.
requirements: Submission of a deactivation request along with a selfie holding an official ID.
If the user visits our head office, a deactivation form will be provided; please note that a photocopy of a government-issued identity must be attached along with the application form.
